That's making broods of more kriel workers and soldiers.@p9 An important role in a hive, sure. But we gave her title of 'queen', because the hive centers around her. But she's more like a factory to a town, than a person. People just seem to have trouble understanding the concept of an alien 'mind' different to their own.

Français: Bon à savoir

English: We get a lot of mining crews in 'ere in the slow months. If there's one thing that ya can sell to them for a good profit, it's Coffee.\nThose mining rigs all run on a steady diet of whiskey, coffee and burgers. Can't say I could stand it m'self.

Français: Bon à savoir

English: Don't need no more lazy bums to skim a drink off me.\nIf you're interested, I can hook you a line with some... connected patrons looking for quality merchandise.\nThey won't pay top credit, but they'll pass the word on ta' their friends.
Français: Je ne veux plus de feignants qui me volent des verres.\nSi vous êtes intéressé, je peux vous mettre en relation avec des... clients connectés qui recherchent des marchandises de qualité.\nIls ne paieront pas le prix fort, mais ils passeront le mot à leurs amis.
Ça a l'air bien.
Je vais passer

English: Alright, one of my regulars is lookin' to get into somewhere he's not meant to be, if ya get my meaning.\nHe's after a Zirax Security Keycard and he's willing to pay 48,000 credits for one.
Français: Très bien, un de mes habitués cherche à entrer dans un endroit où il n'est pas censé être, si vous voyez ce que je veux dire.\nIl cherche une Carte de sécuritéZirax et il est prêt à payer 48,000 credits pour l'une d'elle.
J'en ai une ici
Je vais voir ce que je peux faire

English: I know a collector from outsystem lookin' fer a few 'Antiques' for his art collection. Think you can help 'im out by getting 6 Ancient Relics?\nHe's willing to pay top credit fer something a little more authentic.
I think I can help you there
Français: Je pense que je peux vous aider là
Je vais voir ce que je peux faire

English: It's hard to get good quality materials on the other side of Imperial Space and some of the customers that live out there are willing to pay for top-shelf Leather if you can get it out there.@p9\nThe problem is that the Tal'on are the experts at making REAL leather and them 'zax bastards charge huge tarrifs on Talon-made goods like Leather.\nYou get me 40 Leather and i'll pay you 25,000 credits for the shipment. I'll take it from there.

Français: Je vais voir ce que je peux faire

English: My guy's gonna be very happy with this.\nHe'll also pass on his recommendations to his business partners in The Syndicate.\nI hope ya like being listed as a stand-up guy in the books of lowlifes.

Français: Heureux d'aider

English: <color=#ffffff>Don't got no work for you now that the last bit of business is done.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Maybe something'll turn up again later.</color>

Français: Je vois...

English: You wanna know about Chemical Waste Processing?@w2 Well, we do that here. But you need a permit for it, and you'll be in some serious trouble if you're ever caught dumping that stuff anywhere. It's gotten so bad that factories have to file transit orders on everyone that takes a load of the stuff.@p9 What that means is that you can take a shipment of chemical waste from a factory and bring it here and get paid for your trouble. But if you 'lose' a load of chemical waste, you'll find yourself on a blacklist with Polaris or the Trade Federation.@p9 If you do lose a load, to pirates, customs agents, engine trouble, whatever. You'll need to pay a hefty fine before you can do anymore business.@w5 You can only take one shipment at a time, as well. So don't try and load an entire planet's worth of waste on your ship because no self-respecting factory foreman will let you double-load.@p9 You can make a decent job out of shipping chemical waste to any processing plant if you keep at it, and you're helping keep the galaxy clean while you're at it. So yeah... That about covers it.

Français: <color=#0088ff>Compris</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You're here about Chemical Waste Processing?@w3</color>\n<color=#ffffff>What're you after? Information? Permits? Dropping a big load?@w2 heh.</color>
I have a shipment of chemical waste (NYI)

Français: <color=#0088ff>Peu importe</color>
Console d'ordinateur

English: <color=#66ccff>I can't seem to access this computer terminal.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>It looks like it's designed to forcibly reopen doors and activate sensors in the event that they jam. Doesn't look like I can use this yet...</color>
Français: <color=#66ccff>Je n'arrive pas à accéder à ce terminal informatique.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Il semble qu'il soit conçu pour rouvrir de force les portes et activer les capteurs en cas de blocage. On dirait que je ne peux pas encore l'utiliser...</color>
Partir

English: <color=#66ccff>Looks like a computer console for manually opening doors and activating sensors that have been incorrectly tripped.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>I should be able to use it to reset my progress through the mainframe if I get stuck.</color>
Français: <color=#66ccff>On dirait une console d'ordinateur pour ouvrir manuellement les portes et activer les capteurs qui ont été déclenchés par erreur.</color>\n<color=#66ccff>Je devrais pouvoir l'utiliser pour réinitialiser ma progression dans l'ordinateur central si je suis bloqué.</color>
<color=#ffbb00>Réactiver le disjoncteur de la ventilation</color>
<color=#ffbb00>Nettoyage du système d'incinération</color>
<color=#ffbb00>Ouvrir de force la porte de l'unité centrale</color>
<color=#ffbb00>Activation des capteurs de la salle de contrôle</color>
Déconnexion

English: Looks like the setting has been toggled.\nI hope I didn't break anything...\nThese settings are to debug the story mission in the event that the POI is reset.
Français: On dirait que le paramètre a été modifié.\nJ'espère que je n'ai rien cassé...\nCes paramètres permettent de déboguer la mission de l'histoire au cas où le POI serait réinitialisé.
Retour au menu principal
Ingénieur mécanicien

English: Watch where you're goin!@w3\nWe've got live wires all over the place and gods know how much radiation where the shielding is thin in some places.\nIt's not just the environment outside you gotta worry about 'round here!
Français: Regarde où tu vas !@w3\nIl y a des fils sous tension partout et dieu sait combien de radiations il y a dans certains endroits où le blindage est mince.\nIl n'y a pas que l'environnement extérieur dont il faut s'inquiéter ici !
Vous avez des cellules d'énergie ?
Besoin de fournitures ?
Besoin de marchandises ?
Fournitures
J'ai compris.

English: Watch where you're goin!@w3 We've got live wires all over the place and gods know how much radiation where the shielding is thin in some places. It's not just the environment outside you gotta worry about 'round here!@p9 Damn it all!@w2 We've got a coolant leak in Section-9 and i'm short on people to handle the patch job!@w4 You! Yes, you. Terran.@w3 I need you to do a job for me. Shouldn't be too hard and i'll pay you for it. Whaddaya say?

Damn glad to see that, I am!\nHere, this is out of the repair budget. It's not much, only {MoneyCounter} Credits but it's more than you'd get for that on the market.\nI'll throw in a couple of power cells, just to show you how much you've helped me out!

Français: <color=#0088ff>Pas de problème</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>You've helped us with the most dire of our problems, but we still have dozens more that we need to fix before we can get back to full operation.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>If you're still serious about offering a hand in getting this place operational again, I won't look a gift horse in the mouth.</color>
Français: <color=#ffffff>Vous nous avez aidés à résoudre le plus grave de nos problèmes, mais nous en avons encore des dizaines d'autres à régler avant de pouvoir retrouver un fonctionnement complet.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Si vous voulez vraiment nous aider à rendre cet endroit de nouveau opérationnel, je ne vais pas cracher dans la soupe.</color>
<color=#0088ff>Je ne plaisante pas</color>
<color=#dd0000>Désolé, je n'ai pas le temps.</color>

English: Alright then!\nThis bucket o' bolts is far from the latest model and I don't have any up-to-date schematics and work data on the damn thing.@w3 What I need from you is to go find me some Maintenance Data.\nYou can probably pull one of them out of one of 'em old FTL comm satellites around the sun.

Français: J'ai les données que vous vouliez
<color=#ffffff>Je vais voir ce que je peux faire...</color>

English: Need boots on the ground to help me with this ol' tub.\nSo what I need from you is to find me some volunteers. They don't need to stay on permanantly, just for a few weeks.\nThat's 2 Crew. Terran or Alien, I don't care. But it's probably best if they're the same... species.

Français: <color=#ffffff>Je vais voir ce que je peux faire...</color>

English: Losing charge on capacitor banks 4 through 7 again!\nI keep patching the cables, but there's too much energy loss.@w3 What I really need is a complete replacement with some Superconducting cables.\nThink you can get me 50 or so Superconductors? I'll wire you 200k for 'em.

Français: <color=#ffffff>Je vais voir ce que je peux faire...</color>

English: I need a fresh set of capacitors to replace the Capacitor Banks 1 and 2, since they're the oldest. But getting the right parts ain't a walk in the park from those bum merchants.@w3\nWhat I need is 50 new High-Output Capacitors. Think you're up to it?

Français: <color=#ffffff>Je vais voir ce que je peux faire...</color>

English: Still got that coolant leak to deal with, and not enough hands to go fetch more coolant and a patch to keep new stuff from going the same way as the ol' stuff.@w4\nWhat I need from you is 10 Coolant and 75 Aluminium Foil.\nIt ain't much, but it's honest work.
<color=#0088ff>I've brought the new coolant and patch materials</color>

Français: <color=#ffffff>Je vais voir ce que je peux faire...</color>

English: <color=#ffffff>Nah. It's all good 'ere!</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Should be fine for a couple of weeks now, so I don't got much work worth you wastin' your time on.</color>
Français: <color=#ffffff>Nah. C'est tout bon ici !</color>\n<color=#ffffff>Ca devrait aller pour quelques semaines maintenant, donc je n'ai pas beaucoup de travail qui mérite que tu perdes ton temps.</color>
<color=#0088ff>C'est bon à entendre</color>
Amiral de la flotte

English: <color=#ff5c5c>To think this base would fall to you Terrans! Bah!@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Well, you've gotten your reward from me. I will only give it out once and only to the first one to have reached me. If that's not you, then that is between you and your allies.@p9</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>I have nothing more to give.@w2 Leave me be...</color>
Français: <color=#ff5c5c>Quand je pense que cette base est tombée entre les mains des terriens ! Bah !@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Eh bien, vous avez obtenu votre récompense de ma part. Je ne la donnerai qu'une fois et seulement au premier qui m'aura rejoint. Si ce n'est pas vous, alors c'est entre vous et vos alliés.@p9</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Je n'ai rien d'autre à donner.@w2 Laissez-moi...</color>
Quitter

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I know your face, Terran.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>You were responsible for the loss of another Sector Command.@w3 The base's commander has already given you a reward for your skill in combat. I will not do the same.@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Kill me if you wish, but I will never admit defeat like he did!</color>
Français: <color=#ff5c5c>Je connais votre visage, terrien.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Vous êtes responsable de la perte d'un autre Commandant de Secteur.@w3 Le commandant de la base vous a déjà donné une récompense pour votre habileté au combat. Je ne ferai pas la même chose.@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Tuez-moi si vous voulez, mais je n'admettrai jamais la défaite comme il l'a fait !</color>
Eh bien...

English: <color=#ff5c5c>I don't know how you got down here, Terran. But you should not have been able to reach this room...@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>I suspect an enemy let you in here, or else you cheated to reach this room.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>In either case, you will receive no commendation from me.</color>
Français: <color=#ff5c5c>Je ne sais pas comment vous êtes descendus ici, Terrien. Mais vous n'auriez pas dû être capable d'atteindre cette pièce...@w5</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Je soupçonne qu'un ennemi vous a laissé entrer ici, ou que vous avez triché pour atteindre cette pièce.@w4</color>\n<color=#ff5c5c>Dans les deux cas, vous ne recevrez aucune recommandation de ma part.</color>
Quitter

English: Greetings Terran.@w3 I am Fleet Admiral Kantor Al'Berich, the commander of this base.@w5 I have served the empire for most of my life, as did my father before me, and his before him.@w3 So know that on this day you have bested me and my men in combat, and that you are the first to reach this place in all the empire's history.@p9 This is both a terrible blow to the empire and a black mark on my family's illustrious and decorated history.@w6 I knew it would happen to one of the sector commands eventually, but it brings me much shame for it to be my own command that would be defeated.@p9 You see, I watched your progress from the Command Center and when it became clear that you would reach this place, I retired to my quarters to await your arrival.@w5 I am old, so I know that I cannot beat you in a fight so I surrender myself willingly.@p9 In recognition of your efforts, I would like to give you a ceremonial dagger that was bestown upon me by her Imperial Majesty Xanthia, Empress of the Zirax Empire, and with it the honorary rank that goes with it: Strategos
Français: Salutations, Terrien.@w3 Je suis l'amiral de la flotte Kantor Al'Berich, le commandant de cette base.@w5 J'ai servi l'empire pendant la plus grande partie de ma vie, tout comme mon père avant moi, et le sien avant lui.@w3 Sachez donc qu'en ce jour, vous nous avez battus, moi et mes hommes, au combat, et que vous êtes le premier à atteindre cet endroit dans toute l'histoire de l'empire.@p9 C'est à la fois un coup terrible pour l'empire et une marque noire sur l'histoire illustre et décorée de ma famille. @w6 Je savais que cela arriverait à l'un des commandements de secteur un jour ou l'autre, mais j'ai honte que ce soit sous mon propre commandement que nous soyons vaincus.@p9 Vous voyez, j'ai suivi votre progression depuis le centre de commandement et quand il est devenu évident que vous atteindriez cet endroit, je me suis retiré dans mes quartiers pour attendre votre arrivée.@w5 Je suis vieux, donc je sais que je ne peux pas te battre dans un combat, donc je me rends de bon gré.@p9 En reconnaissance de vos efforts, j'aimerais vous donner une dague de cérémonie qui m'a été offerte par sa Majesté impériale Xanthia, Impératrice de l'Empire de Zirax, et le rang honorifique qui va avec : Strategos
Accepter le rang de Strategos

English: You obtained the Class rank of Strategos! Bonus: +10% damage with Minigun Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Cannon Turrets Bonus: +10% damage with Gatling Guns - Only affects the ship you are piloting -
Français: Vous avez obtenu le rang de classe de Strategos ! Bonus: +10% de dégâts avec les tourelles Minigun Bonus: +10% dégâts avec les tourelles à canon Bonus: +10% dégâts avec les mitrailleuses - N'affecte que le vaisseau que vous pilotez -

English: <color=#ffffff>You do not have sufficient funds to place a bet.</color>
Français: <color=#ffffff>Vous ne disposez pas de fonds suffisants pour placer un pari.</color>
Arrêtez de jouer
Prisonnier

English: Thank you for your assistance. I'll contact my people and they will come pick me up soon.
Français: Merci pour votre aide. Je vais contacter mes proches et ils viendront me chercher bientôt.
Je vous en prie.

English: Please you have to help me! I'm a very wealthy member of the Traders Guild and these filthy pirates abducted me and held me prisoner!
Français: S'il vous plaît, vous devez m'aider ! Je suis un membre très riche de la guilde des commerçants et ces sales pirates m'ont enlevé et retenu prisonnier !

Français: Le prisonnier vous tend un bloc de données avec un message qui vous est adressé par votre nom.

English: Oh thank you, thank you so much! I will contact my people and they will send a ship for me. I will transfer some credits from my bank account to yours.
Français: Oh merci, merci beaucoup ! Je vais contacter mon peuple et ils enverront un navire pour moi. Je vais transférer quelques crédits de mon compte bancaire au vôtre.

English: I'm glad to be of service.
Français: Ravie de vous rendre service.

Français: Le corbeau chante sur le soleil de minuit.

Français: L'ombre du corbeau se lève dans le crépuscule.

Français: J'ai un paquet pour vous.

Français: Mon temps est très précieux. Que voulez-vous ?
Va-t'en, espèce d'imbécile !

Français: Le corbeau croasse au nid.

English: @d0Navigational data can be used to upgrade the distance you can make warp jumps while piloting any capital vessel.\nA maximum of <color=#00ff00>50</color> may be turned in.\nYou currently have a <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> light year increase to your base warp range. You may turn in up to <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color> additional navigational data.
Français: @d0Les données de navigation peuvent être utilisées pour améliorer la distance à laquelle vous pouvez faire des sauts en distorsion lorsque vous pilotez un vaisseau capital.\nUn maximum de <color=#00ff00>50</color> peuvent être restitués.\nVous avez actuellement <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> année-lumière d'augmentation de votre distance de distorsion de base. Vous pouvez transformer jusqu'à <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color> des données de navigation supplémentaires.
Remettre les données de navigation.
@d0<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} Entrée des données de navigation réussie !</color>

Qu'est-ce que les données de navigation ?
Retour.
Sortir.

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Navigational Data:</color> A data pad containing various star charts and navigational maps. Allows a pilot to safely calculate longer warp jumps.\nIncreases the range a pilot may warp by 1 light year while piloting any warp capable capital vessel. May have a higher effect on more advanced warp drives. A maximum of 50 navigational data may be turned in. Excess may be sold.\nCan be obtained rarely in loot, missions, or bought from traders.
Français: @d0<color=#00ffff>Les données de navigation:</color> Un bloc de données contenant diverses cartes stellaires et cartes de navigation. Permet à un pilote de calculer en toute sécurité des sauts de distorsion plus longs.\nAugmente la portée de la distorsion d'une année-lumière pour un pilote de vaisseau capital capable de distorsion. Peut avoir un effet plus important sur les moteurs de distorsion les plus avancés. Un maximum de 50 données de navigation peut être rendu. L'excédent peut être vendu.\nPeut être obtenu rarement dans le butin, les missions, ou acheté auprès de commerçants.

English: You have a bad rep here. Get out.
Français: Vous avez une mauvaise réputation ici. Tirez-vous.

English: Fine. Don't mind if I do. Leave, that is.
Français: Bien. Ça ne vous dérange pas si je le fais. Je pars, c'est tout.
Gratte-papier

English: Welcome. Please, browse around.\nWatch out for pirate activity on your scanners, there's been an increase of attacks lately. Something is driving them to take on bigger and bigger targets.
Français: Bienvenue. S'il vous plaît, explorez les lieux.\nSurveillez l'activité des pirates sur vos scanners, il y a eu une augmentation des attaques dernièrement. Quelque chose les pousse à s'attaquer à des cibles de plus en plus grandes.
J'ai trouvé ces insignes de bandits.

English: You are no longer an enemy of the Free Colonists.
Français: Vous n'êtes plus un ennemi des colons libres.
Merci.

English: How do I use the Salvage License?
Français: Comment utiliser la licence de récupération ?

English:
Laying about the yard are Salvaged Vessels. Each one has a Core Lock mechanism attached to the top of the hull that prevents unauthorized access to the salvage.
Simply purchase a Salvage License and then use the switch on the Core Lock to overload the Core Lock, allowing you to claim the vessel for yourself.
@p9You may then either place your own core on the vessel to remove whole blocks and devices, or leave it coreless and use the salvage mode of a handheld or ship mounted multitool.
Each Salvage License is single use and allows one core lock to be removed.
Attempting to salvage a locked vessel or removing the core lock by force will be met with deadly force.
Français:
Des vaisseaux de récupération traînent dans la cour. Chacun d'entre eux possède un mécanisme de verrouillage du noyau fixé au sommet de la coque qui empêche tout accès non autorisé à la récupération.
Il suffit d'acheter une licence de récupération et d'utiliser l'interrupteur du verrouillage du noyau pour le surcharger, ce qui vous permet de récupérer le vaisseau.
@p9Vous pouvez alors soit placer votre propre noyau sur le vaisseau pour retirer des blocs et des dispositifs entiers, soit le laisser sans noyau et utiliser le mode de récupération d'un multitool portable ou monté sur un vaisseau.
Chaque licence de récupération est à usage unique et permet de retirer un seul noyau de verrouillage.
Tenter de récupérer un vaisseau verrouillé ou de retirer le noyau de verrouillage par la force sera sanctionné par une force mortelle.

English: I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.

Français: @d0Si vous trouvez des insignes de Bandit, Raider, ou Main de la Mort (Death Hand), je les prendrai.

Once you have a kit, place it in your personal inventory then speak to me again.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.

@d0Well well well. You have managed to kill me. I would congratulate you on a job well done, but we both know it was all luck. I will be back in a new clone body, and you just made yourself a new enemy. You better watch your back, {PlayerName}.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Somehow, against all odds, you have killed me. Again. To borrow a phrase I have heard you Terrans use, it was the lag.\nTomorrow is a new day, and with it I will plot my revenge.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0{PlayerName} you are starting to upset me. You and I won't like me when I'm upset. Nobody likes me when I'm upset. It's like being hangry. Or so you Terrans like to say.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0You are most persistent, and stupid. All you are doing is making a name for yourself, {PlayerName}. A bad name. I will make sure that every warlord from here to Decay hears about you!
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0You have no idea the level of pain I will bring down upon you! You will feel my wrath! I will find a way to kill you even if I have to hire half the pirate armada to do it!
@d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0I can admit defeat. You are clearly the better bandit. You will not hear from me again, but know that I will hunt you down.

<color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Greatness. It's about greatness. Or perhaps it's about the need to feel great.\nYes? No, it's more than that. It's bigger than that. Bigger than you or I or even the Empress herself. This is about justice. About revenge. About taking what is rightfully ours! Who are they to stand in our way?\nWe do not have to be enemies, {PlayerName}.
@d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0I admire your persistence. You have bested me where most others would have met with only failure. You are smart, and clearly skilled in the art of combat. I do wonder, if given a different life, you and I would have ended up on a similar path.\nI was once like you, concerned with duty, honor, and serving my people. It took me too long to realize that my people had been in decline for a long time. The Zirax Empire told in the stories of old, the empire that fought against the Legacy threat, is long gone.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0You test my patience. I see now that I must be more direct with you than I have been. I will give you one more chance after this, but know that your days are numbered should you track me down again.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Greatness. It's about greatness. Or perhaps it's about the need to feel great.\nYes? No, it's more than that. It's bigger than that. Bigger than you or I or even the Empress herself. This is about justice. About revenge. About taking what is rightfully ours! Who are they to stand in our way?\nWe do not have to be enemies, {PlayerName}.

<color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
@d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Y-y-you! How did you find me? Never mind that. How did you kill me? Useless guards!\nYou messed everything up, {PlayerName}. How could you do this to me? Do you know how hard I work to find free real estate? Now you ruined all my plans in that sector! I had dreams! Dreams that you ruined! I hate you!
Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Not again! Why do I always die! Why me?\nDo you know how hard it has been to climb the ranks of a bandit gang as a non-Zirax? Do you have any idea what I have had to put myself through?\nI hear them whispering, calling me names behind my back. Tiny Tony. Little Tony. Mini Tony. My name is Small Tony! How DARE they insult me. I'm going to go beat some sense into those Zirax scumbags as soon as I get a (the message abruptly ends)

Français: Chasseur de primes
Avez-vous une preuve de meurtre ?

English: I would like to turn in a bounty
Français: Je voudrais remettre une prime
Comment tout cela fonctionne-t-il ?
Ce n'est pas illégal ou quelque chose comme ça ?
Au revoir.

English: Find a bounty. Take their insignia. Bring it back to a Bounty Hunter Office at a trading station sector in a faction's territory. Get paid.\nDifferent factions have a different list of wanted individuals.\nIt's up to you to find them and obtain their insignias. That's why we pay you.
Français: Trouvez une prime. Prenez leur insigne. Rapporte-le à un bureau de chasseur de primes dans un secteur de station commerciale sur le territoire d'une faction. Vous serez payé.\nLes différentes factions ont une liste différente d'individus recherchés.\nC'est à vous de les trouver et d'obtenir leurs insignes. C'est pourquoi nous vous payons.

English: I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.

English: Thank you for the information. I must be going.
Français: Merci pour ces informations. Je dois y aller.

English: The Bounty Hunter Guild is contracted out by all the big powers of the galaxy to hunt down everyone from lawbreaking troublemakers to ruthless warlords. Do you want to make money? Don't ask questions. Do the job. Get paid.
Français: La guilde des chasseurs de primes est engagée par toutes les grandes puissances de la galaxie pour traquer tout le monde, des fauteurs de troubles en infraction à d'impitoyables seigneurs de la guerre. Vous voulez gagner de l'argent ? Ne posez pas de questions. Faites le travail. Soyez payé.

English: I see... I want to talk about something else
Français: Je vois... Je veux parler d'autre chose.

English: Wait, am I on a wanted list?
Français: Attendez, je suis sur une liste de personnes recherchées ?
Je vais y aller maintenant.

English: Due to confidentiality agreements I am not allowed to say.
Français: En raison d'accords de confidentialité, je ne suis pas autorisé à le dire.

English: I understand. I want to ask something else.
Français: Je comprends. Je veux demander autre chose.

English: I better not be on someone's wanted list! I'll be going.
Français: J'espère ne pas être sur la liste des personnes recherchées ! Je vais y aller.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Enough! I will destroy you! I will rip out whatever internal organs you Terrans have and feed them to my pet Ripper Dog! As soon as I get a pet Ripper Dog. No one would dare make fun of me then! You won't stop me {PlayerName}!
Français: @d0Assez ! Je vais vous détruire ! Je vais arracher tous les organes internes des Terriens et les donner à manger à mon chien éventreur ! Dès que j'aurai un chien éventreur. Personne n'osera se moquer de moi alors ! Tu ne m'arrêteras pas {PlayerName}!

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Ne répondez pas. Supprimez le message et quittez le système de messagerie.

English: @d0P-p-perhaps a deal? Maybe if I give you something, you will stop coming to kill me? Yes? How does 50,000 credits, deposited directly into your account sound? I have the transfer all set up, I just need your response. W-w-what do you say? Stop killing me?
Français: @d0P-p-peut-être un marché ? Peut-être que si je vous donne quelque chose, vous arrêterez de venir me tuer ? Oui ? Que pensez-vous de 50 000 crédits, déposés directement sur votre compte ? J'ai mis en place le transfert, j'ai juste besoin de votre réponse. Qu'est-ce que tu dis ? D'arrêter de me tuer ?
Acceptez le pot-de-vin.

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Ne répondez pas. Supprimez le message et quittez le système de messagerie.
Répondez et acceptez le pot-de-vin.

English: @d0You never responded to my last message! Why not! What do you have against Small Tony? Maybe I offered too little... Yes, how does 100,000 credits sound?
Français: @d0Tu n'as jamais répondu à mon dernier message ! Pourquoi pas ! Qu'est-ce que tu as contre le petit Tony ? J'ai peut-être proposé trop peu... Oui, que dis-tu de 100 000 crédits ?

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0I gave you a chance! I gave you the opportunity to walk away! You won't stop me! No one will stop me! I am Small Tony! This wreck, I mean this fully armed and operational battle station will be mine!
Français: @d0Je t'ai donné une chance ! Je t'ai donné l'opportunité de t'en aller ! Vous ne m'arrêterez pas ! Personne ne m'arrêtera ! Je suis le petit Tony ! Cette épave, je veux dire cette station de combat entièrement armée et opérationnelle sera à moi !

English: Don't respond. Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Ne répondez pas. Supprimez le message et quittez le système de messagerie.
Répondez et acceptez le pot-de-vin.

English: @d0Ouch! That death was especially painful. These clone bills are adding up fast. Small Tony doesn't have the money to keep spending on this. I will make you a final offer. 200,000 credits. P-p-please take it. I don't want to die anymore!
Français: @Aïe ! Cette mort a été particulièrement douloureuse. Ces factures de clone s'accumulent rapidement. Le petit Tony n'a pas l'argent pour continuer à dépenser pour ça. Je vais vous faire une dernière offre. 200,000 crédits. S'il vous plaît, prenez-les. Je ne veux plus mourir !

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0No! I can't take any more dying! That one hurt the most! Please, s-s-spare me! Stop killing me!
Français: @d0Non ! Je ne peux plus supporter de mourir ! C'est celle qui m'a fait le plus mal ! S'il vous plaît, é-é-é-é-pargnez-moi ! Arrêtez de me tuer !
Système de messagerie G.I.N.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Welcome {PlayerName} to the Galactic Information Network Mail System. You have 1 unread message.\nThe message is marked by sender for deletion if not read immediately. Would you like to read it now?</color>
Français: <color=#00ffff>@d0Bienvenue à {PlayerName} sur le système de messagerie du Réseau d'information galactique. Vous avez 1 message non lu. Ce message est marqué par l'expéditeur pour être supprimé s'il n'est pas lu immédiatement. Voulez-vous le lire maintenant ?</color>
Lire le message.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: <color=#00ffff>@d0Are you sure you want to exit the Mail System?\nIf you do so the message will be deleted.</color>
Français: <color=#00ffff>@d0Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir quitter le système de messagerie ?\nSi vous le faites, le message sera supprimé.</color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: I changed my mind. Take me back to the main menu.
Français: J'ai changé d'avis. Ramenez-moi au menu principal.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0You show some promise, but your aim is a little off.
Français: @d0Vous êtes prometteur, mais vous ne visez pas très bien.
Sortie du système de messagerie.

English: @d0it seems there is no more mail from this individual.
Français: @d0il semble qu'il n'y ait plus de courrier de cet individu.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Nobody likes a poor sport. You must learn to accept both victory and defeat with humility and grace.
Français: @d0Personne n'aime les mauvais joueurs. Vous devez apprendre à accepter la victoire et la défaite avec humilité et grâce.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0Your aim is improving. But you need to learn to lead your target.
Français: @d0Your aim is improving. But you need to learn to lead your target.

English: Reply to remind them your aim was good enough to take them out.
Français: Réponds-leur pour leur rappeler que tu visais assez bien pour les éliminer.

English: Insult their aim by telling them they couldn't hit the broadside of a space barn.
Français: Insulter leur but en leur disant qu'ils ne pourraient pas toucher le côté large d'une grange spatiale.

English: Insult their aim by telling them they couldn't hit the broadside of a space barn.
Français: Insulter leur but en leur disant qu'ils ne pourraient pas toucher le côté large d'une grange spatiale.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: Insult their flying by telling them you could fly better blindfolded with one hand tied behind your Back.
Français: Insulter leur vol en leur disant que vous pourriez mieux voler les yeux bandés avec une main attachée dans le dos.

English: @d0You are improving quickly! If I had pilots half as quick as you flying by my side I would have won.
Français: @d0Vous vous améliorez rapidement ! Si j'avais eu des pilotes moitié moins rapides que vous à mes côtés j'aurais gagné.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: Insult their flying by telling them you could fly better blindfolded with one hand tied behind your Back.
Français: Insulter leur vol en leur disant que vous pourriez mieux voler les yeux bandés avec une main attachée dans le dos.

English: @d0You keep this up and you'll get what's coming to you.
Français: @d0Si tu continues comme ça, tu auras ce que tu mérites.

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0I think you are ready for the trials ahead. But I am not sure if the others are. You must make allies. Build armies. And prepare for what's to come.\nI left the Xenu navy because they were too short sighted to prepare for what's coming. I hope you will have more vision.\nI have also sent you all my tips on flying which should add to your knowledge. <color=#ffffff><200 unlock points added></color>
Français: @d0Je pense que vous êtes prêt pour les épreuves à venir. Mais je ne suis pas sûr que les autres le soient. Vous devez vous faire des alliés. Construire des armées. Et vous préparer pour ce qui est à venir.\nJ'ai quitté la marine de Xenu parce qu'ils étaient trop imprévoyants pour se préparer à ce qui est à venir. J'espère que vous aurez plus de clairvoyance.\nJe vous ai aussi envoyé tous mes conseils de pilotage qui devraient enrichir vos connaissances. <color=#ffffff><200 points de déverrouillage ajoutés></color>

English: Delete message and exit mail system.
Français: Supprimer le message et quitter le système de messagerie.

English: @d0I have sent you something you so obviously need. May it serve you well. <color=#ffffff><75 unlock points added></color>
Français: @d0Je vous ai envoyé quelque chose dont vous avez visiblement besoin. Puisse-t-il vous être utile. <color=#ffffff><75 points de déverrouillage ajoutés></color>

English: Create a Progenitor Translation Matrix for {Eden_UCHResearchCost} Terabytes.
Français: Créer une matrice de traduction des progéniteurs pour {Eden_UCHResearchCost} Terabytes.

English: @d0You have used up <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> Terabytes of Progenitor Research to create a Progenitor Translation Matrix.\nThe Translation Matrix grants access to Ancient Progenitor computer systems.\nProgenitor subspace signals have been detected near the edges of the galaxy.
Français: @d0Vous avez consommé <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearchCost}</color> de recherche sur les progéniteurs pour créer une matrice de traduction des progéniteurs.\nLa matrice de traduction donne accès aux systèmes informatiques des Anciens progéniteurs.\nDes signaux subspatiaux des progéniteurs ont été détectés aux confins de la galaxie.
Retour au menu principal.
Sortir.
Puces de données

@d0<size=125%>Données des progéniteurs décryptées : <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color> Terabytes.</size>\n\nRendez les puces de données pour augmenter vos points de recherche. Vous pouvez trouver des puces de données dans les caches de données situées dans les zones froides de l'espace, comme autour des étoiles de classe D ou M.

Français: @d0<color=#ff0000>La fréquence est supérieure à la fréquence de votre choix {CodeGuess}.</color>

English: @d0<color=#00ff00>Hack successful. You have matched the frequency and gained access to the system.</color>
Français: @d0<color=#00ff00>Piratage réussi. Vous avez trouvé la fréquence et accédé au système.</color>
Sortir.

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Hack unsuccessful. You have failed to match the frequency. Lockdown in effect.</color>
Français: @d0<color=#ff0000>Hack échoué. Vous n'avez pas réussi à trouver la fréquence. Verrouillage en cours.</color>
Quitter
Diminuez la fréquence de <color=#00ffff>10</color>
<color=#ff0000>Augmentez la fréquence de 1</color>
<color=#ff0000>Augmentez la fréquence de 10</color>
<color=#ff0000>Diminuez la fréquence de 1</color>
<color=#ff0000>Diminuez la fréquence de 10</color>
Capitaine
Je vous en prie. Au revoir.

English: Thanks to you I will meet my deadline. Once I finish repairs I will be on my way.
Français: Grâce à vous, je vais respecter mon délai. Dès que j'aurai terminé les réparations, je serai en route.

English: Please help me! My ship was attacked by bandits. Before I could do anything they destroyed my mining turrets. I took a time sensitive mining contract for some Hematite and if I don't deliver in time I will lose the contract and my reputation will be ruined!\n@p9I would be in your debt if you were to mine up some Hematite Ore for me from the nearby Hematite asteroid. I need 1 Hematite Ore Shipment to fulfill my contract. You can package Hematite in the Decoration tab of a constructor, then place the shipment in your personal inventory and speak to me again.\nYou are also welcome to help yourself to any other asteroids in the area, I just need the Hematite.
Français: Aidez-moi, s'il vous plaît ! Mon vaisseau a été attaqué par des bandits. Avant que je puisse faire quoi que ce soit, ils ont détruit mes tourelles d'extraction. J'ai pris un contrat d'exploitation minière pour de l'hématite et si je ne le livre pas à temps, je perdrai le contrat et ma réputation sera ruinée !\n@p9 Je vous serais redevable si vous pouviez extraire pour moi du minerai d'hématite de l'astéroïde hématite voisin. J'ai besoin d'une cargaison de minerai d'hématite pour remplir mon contrat. Vous pouvez conditionner l'hématite dans l'onglet Décoration d'un constructeur, puis placer la cargaison dans votre inventaire personnel et me reparler.\nVous pouvez également vous servir dans n'importe quel autre astéroïde de la région, je n'ai besoin que de l'hématite.

English: I will get the 2000 Hematite Ore for you.
Français: Je vais chercher les 2000 minerais d'hématite pour vous.

English: Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. Where's my payment? (45,000-55,000 credits)
Français: Voici votre cargaison de minerai d'hématite. Où est mon paiement ? (45,000-55,000 crédits)

English: Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. I don't need any payment. I'm happy to help a friend in need. (750-1250 reputation)
Français: Voici votre envoi de minerai d'hématite. Je n'ai pas besoin de paiement. Je suis heureux d'aider un ami dans le besoin. (750-1250 réputation)
Au revoir.

English: Thank you. Yes, I suppose it's only fair you are compensated for your time. I have transferred some credits to your bank account.
Français: Merci. Oui, je suppose qu'il est juste que vous soyez dédommagé pour votre temps. J'ai transféré quelques crédits sur votre compte bancaire.
Merci.

English: You do this for free? Thank you! I will tell others of your generosity. You have earned my respect and the respect of Free Colonists everywhere.
Français: Vous faites ça gratuitement ? Je vous remercie ! Je parlerai à d'autres de votre générosité. Vous avez gagné mon respect et celui des colons libres du monde entier.

English: It is my pleasure to help.
Français: C'est avec plaisir que je vous aide.

English: Here is your Hematite Ore Shipment. Do you have any spare ore to trade for it? <color=#ffff00>(Connect to a cargo container first)</color>
Français: Voici votre cargaison de minerai d'hématite. Avez-vous du minerai en réserve à échanger contre celui-ci ? <color=#ffff00>(connectez-vous d'abord à un conteneur de fret)</color>

English: Thank you. I do have some spare ore in my cargo that I don't need. I have transferred it to you, it may be in your ship's connected inventory, or floating in a cargo box next to you.
Français: Merci. J'ai un peu de minerai de réserve dans ma cargaison dont je n'ai pas besoin. Je vous l'ai transféré, il peut être dans l'inventaire connecté de votre vaisseau, ou flotter dans une caisse de cargaison à côté de vous.
Merci.
Contremaître

English: Welcome to our mining operation. I am from Polaris Mining Company, a subsidiary of Polaris Megacorp. The mining vessels in my fleet are contracted through the Union of Independent Miners, or U. I. M.\nYou have perfect timing. One of our mining ships had to head to a repair dock for some maintenance leaving us down a ship. Don't suppose you're looking for work?
Français: Bienvenue dans notre exploitation minière. Je suis de la compagnie minière Polaris, une filiale de Polaris Megacorp. Les vaisseaux miniers de ma flotte sont sous contrat avec l'Union des mineurs indépendants, ou U.M.I. M.\nVous arrivez au bon moment. Un de nos vaisseaux miniers a dû se rendre à un dock de réparation pour de la maintenance, ce qui nous laisse avec un vaisseau en moins. Je suppose que vous cherchez du travail ?
Au revoir.

English: You have already completed your mining contract in this sector.
Français: Vous avez déjà terminé votre contrat d'exploitation minière dans ce secteur.
Quel genre de travail ?
Je n'ai pas le temps.

English: I am glad you asked!\nSince we are down a mining ship we could use some help mining Ilmenite from this asteroid field. You can find several Ilmenite asteroids scattered throughout the area. You will have to use your ship's detector to find them.
Français: Je suis content que vous demandiez !\nPuisque nous n'avons plus de vaisseau minier, nous aurions besoin d'aide pour extraire l'ilménite de ce champ d'astéroïdes. Vous pouvez trouver plusieurs astéroïdes d'ilménite dispersés dans la zone. Vous devrez utiliser le détecteur de votre vaisseau pour les trouver.

English: Sounds simple, but how do I transfer the ore to you and get paid?
Français: Ça semble simple, mais comment vous transférer le minerai et être payé ?

English: Once you have obtained 6,000 Ilmenite Ore, turn it into a Ilmenite Ore Shipment under the Decoration tab of a constructor, place the shipment in your personal inventory, then speak to me again.\nFor contractual reasons, we cannot accept partial transfers. You must turn in an entire shipment of Ilmenite Ore.\nPayment will be in the range of 90,000 to 110,000 credits deposited directly to your bank account, as well as an increase in reputation with Polaris.
Français: Une fois que vous avez obtenu 6 000 minerais d'ilménite, transformez-les en une cargaison de minerais d'ilménite sous l'onglet Décoration d'un constructeur, placez la cargaison dans votre inventaire personnel, puis parlez-moi à nouveau.\nPour des raisons contractuelles, nous ne pouvons pas accepter de transferts partiels. Vous devez remettre une cargaison entière de minerai d'ilménite. Le paiement sera de l'ordre de 90 000 à 110 000 crédits déposés directement sur votre compte bancaire, ainsi qu'une augmentation de votre réputation auprès de Polaris.

English: I accept your terms. I will come back with a Ilmenite Ore Shipment.
Français: J'accepte vos conditions. Je reviendrai avec une cargaison de minerai d'ilménite.

English: I don't have time right now. Goodbye.
Français: Je n'ai pas le temps maintenant. Au revoir.

English: I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.
Contremaître

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have transferred credits to your bank account.\nThis concludes your contract. Polaris Mining Company wishes you a pleasant day!
Français: Merci pour votre aide ! Nous avons transféré des crédits sur votre compte bancaire.\nCeci met fin à votre contrat. La compagnie minière Polaris vous souhaite une bonne journée !
C'est un plaisir de faire affaire avec vous.
Contremaître

English: <color=#00ffff>Here is the Ilmenite Ore Shipment (90,000-110,000 credits)</color>
Français: <color=#00ffff>Voici la cargaison de minerai d'ilménite (90,000-110,000 credits)</color>

English: Our records indicate you are not fit for employment. Good day, good sir and/or madam.
Français: Nos dossiers indiquent que vous n'êtes pas apte à travailler. Bonne journée, monsieur et/ou madame.

English: Whatever. I didn't want the job anyway.
Français: Peu importe. Je ne voulais pas de ce travail de toute façon.
Contremaître

English: According to my records, you are on a do not hire list. Get off my ship!
Français: Selon mes dossiers, vous êtes sur la liste des personnes à ne pas embaucher. Sortez de mon vaisseau !
Bien.
Au revoir.

English: Thank you for your assistance. You have saved my job and my ship!

How do they expect us to mine all this Pyrolusite with one mining ship? I don't even know where to begin! I should have joined the union instead of working for Polaris directly. They are going to scrap my ship for sure for this.
I have the Pyrolusite Ore Shipment
I don't have time to listen to your whining.

Français: Contremaître

English: I was offered a job with Polaris Mining Company. Normally miners are contracted out with the Union of Independent Miners which offers them some autonomy, but this offer direct from Polaris was too good and I couldn't pass it up.\nIt was the worst decision of my life! They send us out into dangerous systems with no backup and give us impossible tasks. But if we don't do what they say they have the right to seize our ships and fire us!\n@p9I was given the job of mining 15,000 Pyrolusite from this mining site. I don't even know where to begin! I have a single low yield civilian mining turret and I'm already late. I've been sitting here overwhelmed by the stress.
I'm sorry about that. I have to go. Goodluck!
Oh thank you, thank you so much! You have saved my job.\nPlease, how can I repay you for this?
I'll just take the credits. (+175.000-225,000 credits)
I'll take any ore that you have. (Random assortment of ore. Connect to a container first)
You could put in a good word for me with your boss. (+1,500-2,000 reputation with Polaris)
I need more time to think about it.
More than happy to pay! You saved my job and I will be able to feed my crew for once!

Français: Merci.

English: I will let my boss know how you assisted us.

Français: Merci.

English: Thank you. I do have some spare ore in my cargo that I don't need. I have transferred it to you, it may be in your ship's connected inventory, or floating in a cargo box next to you.

Français: Merci.

English: Yes. Yes you can! I'll make you a deal. Mine up 15,000 Pyrolusite from the nearby Pyrolusite asteroids, package them up in your constructor's decoration tab, and give me a Pyrolusite Ore Shipment and I'll pay you!\nThat way we both win. You get a reward, and I get to keep my job and my ship. Oh, I guess I get to feed my crew as well.
Never mind. You're on your own.
<color=#00ffff>I have a special delivery of fuel cells.</color>
Took long enough. Wait, let me inspect them... @w4Good, freshly crafted. I suppose you want payment. Here is what you were promised.
I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.
Au revoir.

English: I didn't want to listen to your bad music anyway!

@q0 I have set out among the cosmic shores in search of a new home for my people. Our world is no longer safe for us.\nI was one of the first volunteers to delve into the great beyond. I hope I find what I seek.
The search for a suitable planet has been difficult. Many are inhospitable or already inhabited. This planet does not have the correct oxygen levels or sunlight. I must move on.

My ship was hit by an ion storm and I had to make an emergency landing here. I expect to have repairs complete in 2 to 3 suns.\nThere are locals here who speak Tal'on. They tell me of a strange black sphere with green glowing bands that appeared in the sky one day blocking out the sun, only to disappear a few minutes earlier. This is troubling.

Another planet unsuitable for habitation. Though my species is naturally long lived, I miss home. I do this for them.\nI may have to change my search parameters if I am to find a home before the war reaches my homeworld.

I now believe that we cannot afford to search for temperate worlds. I am going to expand my search to include Arid worlds. While not like the pristine woodlands of my home world, I know our species can survive there. If the Sun and Moon clans can do it, so can we.\nI heard about an arid planet called Parthix from a fellow traveler with rings of gold. That is where I will go next. Perhaps with luck it will be uninhabited.
Scan statue and import data into PDA.
You can't be here! Guards! Guards!
Hello sir and or madam. May I interest you in some ore mined up by our fleet? Or perhaps you have come to sell used mining equipment?
<color=#00ffff>I have a special delivery of fuel cells.</color>
Welcome. Do you have Bandit, Raider, or Death's Hand Insignias to turn in?
Where do I find Bandit, Raider, or Death's Hand Insignias?

Français: Au revoir.

English: You can find Bandit, Raider, and Death's Hand Insignias from certain patrol vessels belonging to those Warlord factions. Most often found in neutral space in combat sites.
I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.
Merci. Au revoir.

English: I get to meet all kinds of interesting people in my line of work! Like the captain who had just returned from a system near the edge of the galaxy. He couldn't stop talking about the strange alien drones he found there.
Do you know about the Ancient Warp Gate that lies on the edge of the galaxy? No one has been able to figure out how to power it. Maybe you'd have better luck.
I have a hypothesis that The Progenitors we study now actually came from a far older civilization in a dwarf galaxy. Perhaps fragments of their technology remain, if only we can find them.
There have been reports of increased Bandit and Raider activity in neutral space. Be careful.
Have you heard of Pantheis? He helped design the Project Eden research vessels. I hope to be half as good as he is one day.
Have you heard of the Brotherhood of Farr? My sister just got back from visiting their homeworld of Parthix. She said its golden rings are beautiful.
Stay away from black holes and rogue planets. Heard many ships have been lost in those systems.
I'm tired of being hunted by the Zirax empire. We should strike back at their homeworld! The Throneworld? Hah!
No time to chat. I have a lot of work to do.
Have you seen how much Magmacite weighs? That stuff is almost impossible to mine! First you have to find a molten planet around a M1Ia star and then... Well, you get the idea.
I've thought about becoming a bounty hunter. You can make great money selling insignias to the other factions.
Had a Trading Guild representative visit us who gave us the best hamburgers I've ever had. Said he grew the wheat for them himself outdoors on a tropical planet.
I heard there are dead worlds out there full of salvage. I wonder what happened to the civilizations that lived there.
Be careful flying through gas clouds. Bandits love to set up traps for the unwary.
Hello there. Welcome to the Archives. May I interest you in some ancient cookbooks? Perhaps a text on our mythology or an old hunter's guide on how to skin a Farrbear?
<color=#00ffff>I am looking for information on any travelers who had visited Parthix in the past.</color>
I wish to learn more about the Brotherhood of Farr
I don't need any assistance, goodbye.
You can find much of our story here in the Archives or in the nearby Farr's Arrival which is the original ship Farr crashed in.

Français: Merci. Au revoir.

English: Travelers to Parthix in the past? You mean besides Farr? Hmm... There is a tale of an ancient traveler who came here on an airship, but it is considered myth and not a historical fact.\nIt will take me some time to find the text in the Archive, come back later. In the meantime please consider exploring the rest of the Archives or Temple Prime and Farr's Arrival to learn more of our history.\nI will send a message to your PDA when I have located the text.
<color=#00ffff>Thank you. I will wait for your message.</color>
@q0 @d0 I have found the text you're looking for {PlayerName}. Return to me in the Archives.

I don't believe so, though you do seem familiar... Wait, you... No, you can't be him! You're the one who....\nI have something for you. <color=#ffff00>Make sure you got some room in your inventory.</color>
Shhh. Don't say anything. I think I'm being watched.
Nope, must be a funny coincidence. I've never been here before. Who? Me? Never! Honest!

I completely understand. I don't know you and I never met you.\nIt is a complete coincidence that I happen to have limited edition posters with your name on it then. Here, have them, as a token of appreciation for uhh, visiting our world for the first time. Yeah, we like to give out posters here on Parthix.\nThe Archivist smiles and hands you a bundle of limited edition posters.
You have worn out our generosity!
He wandered Parthix seeking audiences with leaders. Before he left he built a stone statue. The statue has long since been destroyed but the inscription was recorded in the book.

The people of Parthix are divided but have much potential. Primitive, but resourceful. They cannot aid me, however, and I have received word that I am being given a new task. I am to travel to a moon where crystal meets the sky and keep watch there, waiting for the day the relic of the stars is found.
I see. Thank you for this history lesson.

No please, it is I who should be thanking you! You have solved the mystery of who this traveler was and confirmed the myth was real. We have encountered several crystalline moons that fit the description in the inscription. Perhaps you can continue your search there.\nYou have added to our history today, and for that I am thankful. Please, have this gift, may it serve you well.
An ancient book of fables that speaks of a green skinned traveler who came from the sky in a ship of wood and metal.
Your Golden Rule has been recharged. I hope it continues to serve you well.
Hello, how may I assist you?

Français: Au revoir.
Au revoir.

English: You do not have enough reputation with the Zirax Empire to have dealings with me.
My records indicate you do not have the required reputation with Polaris to trade with me.
You do not have the required reputation with the Trader Guild to access my trades.
You don't have enough reputation with the Free Colonists to trade with me.
The Pirates do not know you well enough to access my trades.
You do not have enough reputation with my faction to access my trades.
@d0On behalf of the Trader Guild, welcome!\nI am a Personal Assistant Mechanoid model T-799. How may I assist you?
I don't need any help. Thank you.

@d0Very simple. As a neutral party, the Trader Guild is often contracted out by the other factions to transfer cargo.\nIn turn, we contract out some of the deliveries to third parties such as you. Of course you probably want to know how you can make money from this.
What do I need to do?
Français: Que dois-je faire ?

English: I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.

English: Do you have any personal delivery contracts available?
At this time personal delivery contracts are not available.\nThe Trader Guild hopes to make them available in the future.
I want to ask something else.
Français: Je souhaiterais demander autre chose.
Au revoir.

English: @d0Once you have a schematic in your <color=#00ff00>personal inventory</color>, meet the <color=#00ff00>requirements</color> listed on the schematic, and <color=#00ff00>do not already have it unlocked</color>, you may turn them in here to unlock the crafting recipe.\n<color=#ffff00>Schematics may require a certain number of unlock points to be able to turn them in. You must have the unlock points available to use or you won't see the option to turn in the schematic.</color>\nYou can sell unneeded schematics to UCH Quartermasters on board the ship.
Français: @d0Une fois que vous avez un schéma dans votre <color=#00ff00>inventaire personnel</color>, que vous remplissez les <color=#00ff00>exigences</color> indiquées sur le schéma, et que <color=#00ff00>vous ne l'avez pas déjà débloqué</color>, vous pouvez les remettre ici pour débloquer la recette d'artisanat.\n<color=#ffff00>Les schémas peuvent nécessiter un certain nombre de points de déverrouillage pour pouvoir les rendre. Vous devez avoir les points de déverrouillage disponibles pour les utiliser ou vous ne verrez pas l'option de rendre le schéma.</color>\nVous pouvez vendre les schémas inutiles aux quartiers-maîtres de l'UCH à bord du navire.
<color=#00ffff>Technologie UCH</color>
Déverrouiller <color=#00ff00>Tourelle Flak Sentinel</color> (coût de 50 point de compétences)
Retour au menu principal

English: <color=#00ff00>You have unlocked a new crafting template.</color>
Français: <color=#00ff00>Vous avez débloqué un nouveau modèle d'artisanat.</color>
<color=#ff0000>Technologie Ziraxienne</color>
<color=#ff00ff>Technologie Alien</color>
<color=#ffff00>Technologie Pirate</color>
<color=#00afff>Technologie Civile</color>
Retour au menu principal
Retour au menu principal
Retour au menu principal
Retour au menu principal
Retour au menu principal
Technologie de l'UCH
@d0Civilian Technology
@d0Pirate Technology
@d0Zirax Technology
@d0Alien Technology
@d0Other Technology

English:
@d0You can only see options to turn in schematics when you meet the requirements to use them and have not unlocked the item already.
Schematics will be listed under the category listed in their tooltip.
You can obtain schematics through missions, trading, or loot.

<color=#ffff00>Schematics may also require a certain number of unlock points to be able to turn them in. You must have the unlock points available to use or you won't see the option to turn in the schematic.</color>
Français: @d0Les options permettant de rendre les schémas ne s'affichent que lorsque vous remplissez les conditions requises pour les utiliser et que vous n'avez pas déjà débloqué l'objet en question. Les schémas sont répertoriés dans la catégorie indiquée dans leur infobulle. Vous pouvez obtenir des schémas par le biais de missions, d'échanges ou de butins.n\n<color=#ffff00>Les schémas peuvent également nécessiter un certain nombre de points de déverrouillage pour pouvoir les rendre. Vous devez avoir les points de déverrouillage disponibles pour les utiliser ou vous ne verrez pas l'option de rendre le schéma.</color>
Retour au menu principal
Quitter
Aide
Quitter
Déverrouiller Petite tourelle vulcaine (coûte 75 points)
Déverrouiller Injecteurs de nanites
Déverrouiller Injecteurs de nanites avancés
Déverrouiller Brassins de Pomme de Terre
Déverrouiller Bandages améliorés

Déverrouiller Minigun incendiaire
Déverrouiller <color=#ffff00>Blaster lourd du Syndicat</color> (coûte 50 points)
A.D.I

English: @q0@d0You find yourself stranded on an alien world. Find a way to survive and eventually travel to space. Default story missions are not available to complete on this starting planet but can be started by traveling to some of the other starting planets. You may also start the Project Eden story by activating the mission Make Contact with Terran Forces in your PDA (F1). This starting planet may be intended for experienced players and may have more difficult POIs and other challenges not found on a typical starting planet and may require unconventional tactics. Play on this starting planet at your own risk. Valuable tips and useful information can be found in the Empyriopedia section of the PDA (F1).
Français: @q0@d0Vous vous retrouvez échoué sur un monde étranger. Trouvez un moyen de survivre et de voyager dans l'espace. Les missions d'histoire par défaut ne sont pas disponibles sur cette planète de départ mais peuvent être commencées en voyageant sur certaines des autres planètes de départ. Vous pouvez également commencer l'histoire du Projet Eden en activant la mission Prendre contact avec les forces terriennes dans votre PDA (F1). Cette planète de départ peut être destinée aux joueurs expérimentés et peut comporter des POI plus difficiles et d'autres défis que l'on ne trouve pas sur une planète de départ typique et peut nécessiter des tactiques non conventionnelles. Jouez sur cette planète de départ à vos risques et périls. De précieux conseils et des informations utiles peuvent être trouvés dans la section Empyriopedia du PDA (F1).
<color=#00ff00>J'ai lu et compris.</color>

English: How do I start the default story missions?
Français: Comment démarrer les missions d'histoire par défaut ?

English: @q0@d0The default story missions (Vanilla missions if playing Project Eden or Reforged Galaxy missions if playing Reforged Eden) are currently available to complete by traveling to the following starting planets in the Alpha and Beta starting solar systems: Haven/Persephone/Gaia, Akua, Omicron, Roggery, Ningues. Other planets may have their own unique starting missions or no starting missions at all. They will say in the description of the planet. After landing on one of those planets activate the introduction or first chapter of the story mission in the PDA (F1). You can also start the Project Eden story missions at any time under the Project Eden section in the PDA.
Français: @q0@d0Les missions de l'histoire par défaut, (missions Vanilla si vous jouez à Projet Eden ouMissions de Reforged Galaxy si vous jouez à Reforged Eden) sont actuellement disponibles à compléter en voyageant vers les planètes de départ suivantes dans les systèmes solaires de départ Alpha et Beta : Haven/Persephone/Gaia, Akua, Omicron, Roggery, Ningues. D'autres planètes peuvent avoir leurs propres missions de départ ou ne pas avoir de missions de départ du tout. Elles seront indiquées dans la description de la planète. Après avoir atterri sur l'une de ces planètes, activez l'introduction ou le premier chapitre de la mission de l'histoire dans le PDA (F1). Vous pouvez également lancer les missions de l'histoire du Projet Eden à tout moment dans la section Projet Eden du PDA.
Je suis toujours confus

English: @q0@d0Still confused? Please see the <color=#00ffff>Empyriopedia</color> section of the PDA <color=#ffff00>(F1)</color> or post on the Workshop page for the scenario for assistance.

Français: Retour

English: @d0Your guess was not within the valid code range.
@d0<color=#ff0000>Your guess was lower than the code.</color>

Français: Retour

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Your guess was higher than the code.</color>

Français: Quitter

English: You have hacked everything you can.

Français: Quitter

English:
@d0Greetings commander. I have scanned the locking mechanism and computer and have determined how the mechanism works.
Each time you access the terminal a new security code is generated between two random values. I can detect those values but cannot see what the code is.
You must guess the code until you input the correct code. If you input an incorrect code I can determine whether the code is higher or lower than your guess and adjust the code range accordingly.
<color=#ff0000>Failing too many times may lock you out of the system permanently and closing the hacking window may cause you to lose all hacking progress.</color>
@p9 @d0Occasionally I may detect a backdoor or security flaw in the system that you can choose to exploit later. If such an option is available to you it will show up on the hacking menu.
<color=#00ffff>Security Resets:</color> These give you additional hacking attempts.
<color=#00ffff>Codebreakers:</color> Available when your guess is close to the actual code. Instantly hacks the system.
<color=#00ffff>High or Low Frequency Code Scanners:</color> Adjusts the maximum or minimum code range to be closer to the actual code. Only available when the difference between the code range and code is large enough.
@p9 @d0Some security systems have multiple firewalls. In such systems you may unlock each firewall in order. The more firewalls you hack the greater the potential reward.
When you successfully hack a firewall in a multi-firewall system you increase your <color=#00ffff>hacking skill</color> up to a maximum amount.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking skill</color> slightly reduces the initial variance between the minimum and maximum code range.
You currently get a {Eden_PlayerHackingSkill} reduction in the code variance due to your hacking skill.

English: Have you seen those strange statues on Earth-like planets? They look like they could be of Talon origin.
Français: Avez-vous vu ces étranges statues sur des planètes semblables à la Terre ? On dirait qu'elles pourraient être d'origine talonienne.

English: I hope to be on an expedition to the Dronelands! It's rumored to be dangerous but I don't believe the stories.
Français: J'espère participer à une expédition dans les Dronelands ! On dit que c'est dangereux, mais je ne crois pas à ces histoires.

English: Watch out for The Syndicate. My brother got involved with them and now he's deep in debt.
Français: Méfiez-vous du Syndicat. Mon frère a été impliqué avec eux et maintenant il est très endetté.

English: We really should have stayed longer at that Abandoned Tomb on the last Desert Oasis planet we visited. I know there was a way inside!
Français: Nous aurions vraiment dû rester plus longtemps à cette tombe abandonnée sur la dernière planète Désert Oasis que nous avons visitée. Je sais qu'il y avait un chemin à l'intérieur !

English: We really should have stayed longer at that Abandoned Tomb on the last Desert Oasis planet we visited. I know there was a way inside!
Français: Nous aurions vraiment dû rester plus longtemps à cette tombe abandonnée sur la dernière planète Désert Oasis que nous avons visitée. Je sais qu'il y avait un chemin à l'intérieur !
Je souhaite faire du commerce.
Au revoir.
Quartier-maître

English: Hello and welcome to our research vessel. She might not be much to look at but she's a tough ship.\nI'm the quartermaster of this ship. How may I help you?
Français: Bonjour et bienvenue sur notre navire de recherche. Il n'est peut-être pas très beau, mais c'est un navire solide. Je suis l'intendant de ce navire. Comment puis-je vous aider ?

English: Yes I do have some supplies I can spare. I'm sure you will put them to good use. I also have this old poster lying around. Find a good home for it, will you?\nYou will find them either in your personal inventory, or your connected container, or floating next to you if you did not have enough room.
Français: Oui, j'ai quelques fournitures dont je peux me passer. Je suis sûr que vous en ferez bon usage. J'ai aussi ce vieux poster qui traîne. Trouvez-lui un bon foyer, voulez-vous ?\nVous les trouverez soit dans votre inventaire personnel, soit dans votre conteneur connecté, soit en flottant à côté de vous si vous n'aviez pas assez de place.

English:
@d0Turn in research reports to obtain unlock points. The report must be in your personal inventory.
You can create research reports in the Decoration tab of a Small, Large, or Advanced Constructor.
The amount of unlock points you gain is based on which report you turn in.

Where did you get this music?

I got them off a Terran awhile ago. English: When will you get more free supplies?

I can't offer any more free supplies to you, however we can discuss trading and my stock is replenished regularly.

If you visit other UCH Research Vessels they may be able to offer you more supplies and different ones than I could.
As you explore more you may start finding ships that even have more valuable supplies.

English: Hello sir and or madam. Welcome to one of Polaris Megacorp's premiere distribution centers! How may I assist you?
<color=#00ff00>I was told to meet you here on behalf of the UCH.</color>
You are not the alien I'm looking for.
Ah yes, so you are {PlayerName}, I assume? It is good to meet you!\nI understand that you are interested in purchasing the schematics to one of our newest inventions?
That is correct. I am authorized to purchase the schematic on behalf of the UCH for 3 million credits.
Ah yes, yes yes I see. Well, I would love to sell you the schematic but you see, I seem to have misplaced it.
Not my problem. You don't get a single credit until I see the schematic.

Well, more like had it stolen from me. Some filthy pirate thieves stole the schematic right off this station and took off in a corvette!\nIf you return the schematic to us, you can have it. Free of charge.

Look, you came all the way out here from who knows where for this schematic. That tells me that you want it. Frankly if you won't help me then I'll just find someone else who will.\nSome pirates stole it from me. If you get it back I'll give you the schematic free of charge, even if it is against my better judgment with how rude you are.
Do you know where it is?
Français: Savez-vous où il se trouve ?

English: Do you know where it is?
Français: Savez-vous où il se trouve ?

English:
Luckily I had placed a tracker on the case holding the schematic. You will find them in orbit of a planet in a nearby K2-7 class star system in Polaris territory, though you will have to warp to that system to narrow down their location. I will give you the tracking frequency.
Get my schematic back and you can have it. Free of charge. Honest.

To find the system, search your galaxy map for star type K2-7. There should be one nearby in Polaris territory.
<color=#00ff00>I will get it back and you better not be lying about it being free!</color>
@d0There is power running to this console.

Français: <color=#00ff00>Accès aux journaux.</color>
Sortir.

English: @d0There is various navigational and sensor logs on this console. From what you can tell they were simple rum smugglers that were ambushed by a Zirax patrol vessel.\nYou find no mention of stealing a schematic.\nThe logs show the Zirax patrol vessel landed on the nearby moon for 34 minutes and then departed the system. Perhaps you can continue your search there.

Français: <color=#00ff00>Entrer les données dans le PDA.</color>

English: @d0The console stands ready. A zirax hack was partially successful.

Français: Quitter

English:
The schematic? Oh yes, about that. You see, I am afraid I may have... Exaggerated slightly as to the whereabouts of the schematic.

We've been having a problem with Zirax infiltrators sabotaging our prototype mining rigs. But we could not risk open warfare by dealing with them ourselves. That's where you came in.
@p9I knew that you would be willing to pay for the schematic, but I could not be sure whether you would be willing to risk killing members of the Zirax empire for it.
But if I told you that it had been stolen by a ruthless band of pirate scum? Well then that would give you a clear conscious to do what was needed.

Français: Vous m'avez menti.

English: Lying is such a strong word. I see it more as keeping out some unnecessary details.\nAt the end of the day, our Zirax problem has been dealt with and you are now free to purchase the schematic you seek.
Français: Mentir est un mot si fort. Je vois plutôt cela comme le fait de cacher des détails inutiles. En fin de compte, notre problème avec Zirax a été réglé et vous êtes maintenant libre d'acheter le schéma que vous cherchez.

English: Purchase? You said it would be free.
Français: Un achat ? Vous avez dit que ce serait gratuit.

English: Free? Oh yes, I did say that, didn't I?\nWell then I will transfer a payment of 500,000 to your bank account for services rendered. If you can cough up 3,000,000 credits then you are free to speak to me again to purchase the schematic.\nOr not. It's your choice.
Français: Gratuit ? Oh oui, j'ai dit ça, n'est-ce pas ? Alors je vais transférer un paiement de 500 000 sur votre compte bancaire pour services rendus. Si vous pouvez cracher 3 000 000 de crédits, vous serez libre de me reparler pour acheter le schéma.\nOu pas. C'est votre choix.
<color=#00ff00>Tu es un petit c...</color>
Entrez la quantité à rendre
Accepter
Annuler
